SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS movie_company, MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating, MIN(t.title) AS western_violent_movie
FROM company_name AS cn,
   company_type AS ct,
   info_type AS it1,
   info_type AS it2,
   keyword AS k,
   kind_type AS kt,
   movie_companies AS mc,
   movie_info AS mi,
   movie_info_idx AS mi_idx,
   movie_keyword AS mk,
   title AS t
WHERE kt.id = t.kind_id
AND t.id = mi.movie_id
AND t.id = mk.movie_id
AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
AND t.id = mc.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
AND mi.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
AND k.id = mk.keyword_id
AND it1.id = mi.info_type_id
AND it2.id = mi_idx.info_type_id
AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
AND cn.id = mc.company_id
AND cn.country_code != '[us]'
AND it1.info = 'countries'
AND it2.info = 'votes'
AND k.keyword IN ('based-on-novel', 'based-on-novel', 'independent-film', 'based-on-novel', 'based-on-novel')
AND kt.kind IN ('episode', 'episode', 'episode', 'episode', 'episode')
AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%Cuba%'
AND mc.note LIKE '%2007%'
AND mi.info IN ('Documentary', 'Documentary', 'Silent', 'Comedy', 'UK')
AND mi_idx.info < '6.0'
AND t.production_year > 2002;

   company_type AS ct,
   info_type AS it1,
   info_type AS it2,
   keyword AS k,
   kind_type AS kt,
   movie_companies AS mc,
   movie_info AS mi,
   movie_info_idx AS mi_idx,
   movie_keyword AS mk,
   title AS t
WHERE kt.id = t.kind_id
AND t.id = mi.movie_id
AND t.id = mk.movie_id
AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
AND t.id = mc.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
AND mi.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
AND k.id = mk.keyword_id
AND it1.id = mi.info_type_id
AND it2.id = mi_idx.info_type_id
AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
AND cn.id = mc.company_id
AND cn.country_code != '[us]'
AND it1.info = 'genres'
AND it2.info = 'votes'
AND k.keyword IN ('surrealism', 'violence', 'nudity', 'surrealism', 'non-fiction')
AND kt.kind IN ('tv movie', 'tv series', 'tv movie', 'movie', 'tv movie')
AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%USA%'
AND mc.note LIKE '%theatrical%'
AND mi.info IN ('English', 'USA', 'English', 'USA', 'Short')
AND mi_idx.info < '7.7'
AND t.production_year > 1969;
